amendment.description: To make the Savannah River National Laboratory eligible for laboratory directed research and development funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1387 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1387 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12499) To make the Savannah River National Laboratory eligible for laboratory directed research and development funding.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1387 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1387 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham.
